title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: AI-Integrated Continuing Pharmacy Education Design Strategies: Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedure for drafting educational materials with 80% accuracy using AI-based content generation tools.
Learners can present three or more ethical guidelines for the use of AI in pharmaceutical continuing education.
Learners can simulate a learner needs diagnosis process applying AI analysis tools in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
